title: Simone Duez
subtitle: Paint artist
description: IDD regulations introduced in 2018 meant consumers had to understand every item in their insurance product. I worked on the agile prototyping team that designed and user tested the successful solution for the RAC. My role within the team focused primarily on UI design and interface animation. Our deliverable for this project was a fully interactive code prototype.
